titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 100th anniversary of the birth of Dr. Andrei Dmitrievich Sakharov.
A resolution recognizing the 100th anniversary of the birth of Dr. Andrei Dmitrievich Sakharov.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the historical significance of Dr. Andrei Dmitrievich Sakharov and his work to promote human dignity and political freedom in the Soviet Union and around the world.
